definitions.definition: The act or process of boring holes; such practice as an area of expertise in manufacturing.
examples: fine boring with a boring head on a boring mill

definitions.definition: A pit or hole which has been bored .
One of the fragments thrown up when something is bored or drilled.

main_definition: The act or process of boring holes; such practice as an area of expertise in manufacturing.
secondary_definitions: A pit or hole which has been bored .
( usually in the plural ) One of the fragments thrown up when something is bored or drilled.
